# Next.js Project with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS

## Project Details
- Framework: Next.js 16 with TypeScript
- UI Library: shadcn/ui
- Styling: Tailwind CSS v4
- Features: Responsive side navigation bar layout

## Completed Setup
- Next.js project scaffolded with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and ESLint
- shadcn/ui initialized and sidebar components installed
- App layout updated with sidebar navigation
- Home page redesigned with example content
- Development server running at http://localhost:3000

## Available Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm start` - Start production server
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint

## Installed shadcn/ui Components
- Sidebar (with all dependencies)
- Button
- Separator
- Sheet
- Tooltip
- Input
- Skeleton

## Next Steps
You can:
- Add more pages to the app
- Install additional shadcn/ui components with `npx shadcn@latest add [component]`
- Customize the sidebar navigation items
- Modify the theme colors in `src/app/globals.css`
- Add your own content and features
